history.text: Hi
Hello!
Did you read about a movie?
Yes, I read about Catch Me If You Can.  Have you seen it?  It's a highly rated movie.
No, but I've heard about it. I'm very interested in seeing it sometime maybe.
Do you think I should?
It has Leonardo DiCaprio, and Tom Hanks.  They are pretty great.
I like most things with Tom Hanks in it. What's it about?

It's based on a true story of this guy named Frank Abagnale.  When he was only 19, he pulled a con posing as an airline pilot.  It started him on a career of cons.  Tom Hanks plays an FBI agent trying to track him down. Leo is the con man.
That sounds like a very interesting plot. Have you seen it or are you planning to?
Yes, it came out in 2002 and I saw it then, but saw it again more recently.  It's a really fast-paced movie, so you don't get bored.
Who did you like the best in the movie? Does Leo play the Abagnale?
Yes.  Also Christopher Walken is in it and plays his dad.
Did it win any awards or anything like that?
I don't think it won any awards.  It could have! It was a very clever movie and had humor as well as suspense.
How long is it?
It is 2 hours and 20 minutes, so pretty long.
I hope it's not hard to follow the plot with a movie that long, but you seem to describe it very well.

I think it was well written.  It's more interesting knowing that it's a true story.  The guy, Frank, finally did get caught by the FBI and they actually cut him a deal to work with them instead of finishing his prison time because he was so brilliant.
Who wrote it?
Jeff Nathanson.  I'm not sure what else he's written.
Is there anything else you can tell me that would help me decide if I want to watch it? You have given me a great description of everything so far so thank you.

It is a crime drama, but unlike some crime stories that are really bloody and impersonal, this one really gets behind the emotions of the characters and shows what prompted this guy Frank to start this criminal career.
Yeah, I like that. You need to really feel what the characters are feeling for it to be believable and for you to get into the plot. You are making me more interested in watching it.
Sweet.  Are you a person who likes to know how a movie ends or should I keep it a surprise?
I like to be able to predict how a movie ends, but you can tell me if you want to.
Ha ha, well I'll just say it has one of those true story "This is where the people ended up" kinds of things, and it's a really cool ending.
That kind of reminds me of other crime movies.
Are you planning on seeing it again?
I probably will when my kids get big enough to see it.
Ok, well, thank you for your help! Have a nice night!

uid1response.feedback: I like this way of being able to decide how to see a movie! Thanks for your help!
